findings.message:
Reentrancy in lockEtherPay.release() (0x0cccfba8ac882e2025a880c875760ed2d4044860.sol#100-108):
	External calls:
	- token_amount = tokenBalance() (0x0cccfba8ac882e2025a880c875760ed2d4044860.sol#104)
		- token_reward.balanceOf(this) (0x0cccfba8ac882e2025a880c875760ed2d4044860.sol#84)
	- token_reward.transfer(beneficiary,token_amount) (0x0cccfba8ac882e2025a880c875760ed2d4044860.sol#105)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- isReleased = true (0x0cccfba8ac882e2025a880c875760ed2d4044860.sol#107)
	lockEtherPay.isReleased (0x0cccfba8ac882e2025a880c875760ed2d4044860.sol#71) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- lockEtherPay.isReleased (0x0cccfba8ac882e2025a880c875760ed2d4044860.sol#71)
	- lockEtherPay.release() (0x0cccfba8ac882e2025a880c875760ed2d4044860.sol#100-108)
findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth

findings.message:
Reentrancy in lockEtherPay.lock() (0x0cccfba8ac882e2025a880c875760ed2d4044860.sol#87-93):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(tokenBalance() > 0) (0x0cccfba8ac882e2025a880c875760ed2d4044860.sol#89)
		- token_reward.balanceOf(this) (0x0cccfba8ac882e2025a880c875760ed2d4044860.sol#84)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- isLocked = true (0x0cccfba8ac882e2025a880c875760ed2d4044860.sol#92)
	lockEtherPay.isLocked (0x0cccfba8ac882e2025a880c875760ed2d4044860.sol#70) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- lockEtherPay.isLocked (0x0cccfba8ac882e2025a880c875760ed2d4044860.sol#70)
	- lockEtherPay.lock() (0x0cccfba8ac882e2025a880c875760ed2d4044860.sol#87-93)
	- lockEtherPay.release() (0x0cccfba8ac882e2025a880c875760ed2d4044860.sol#100-108)
findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth

findings.message:
Reentrancy in lockEtherPay.release() (0x0cccfba8ac882e2025a880c875760ed2d4044860.sol#100-108):
	External calls:
	- token_amount = tokenBalance() (0x0cccfba8ac882e2025a880c875760ed2d4044860.sol#104)
		- token_reward.balanceOf(this) (0x0cccfba8ac882e2025a880c875760ed2d4044860.sol#84)
	- token_reward.transfer(beneficiary,token_amount) (0x0cccfba8ac882e2025a880c875760ed2d4044860.sol#105)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- TokenReleased(beneficiary,token_amount) (0x0cccfba8ac882e2025a880c875760ed2d4044860.sol#106)
findings.name: reentrancy-events

findings.message:
lockEtherPay.lockOver() (0x0cccfba8ac882e2025a880c875760ed2d4044860.sol#95-98) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- current_time > end_time (0x0cccfba8ac882e2025a880c875760ed2d4044860.sol#97)
findings.name: timestamp

findings.message:
Version constraint ^0.4.18 contains known severe issues (https://solidity.readthedocs.io/en/latest/bugs.html)
	- DirtyBytesArrayToStorage
	- ABIDecodeTwoDimensionalArrayMemory
	- KeccakCaching
	- EmptyByteArrayCopy
	- DynamicArrayCleanup
	- ImplicitConstructorCallvalueCheck
	- TupleAssignmentMultiStackSlotComponents
	- MemoryArrayCreationOverflow
	- privateCanBeOverridden
	- SignedArrayStorageCopy
	- ABIEncoderV2StorageArrayWithMultiSlotElement
	- DynamicConstructorArgumentsClippedABIV2
	- UninitializedFunctionPointerInConstructor_0.4.x
	- IncorrectEventSignatureInLibraries_0.4.x
	- ExpExponentCleanup
	- EventStructWrongData
	- NestedArrayFunctionCallDecoder.
It is used by:
	- ^0.4.18 (0x0cccfba8ac882e2025a880c875760ed2d4044860.sol#1)
findings.name: solc-version

findings.message: solc-0.4.26 is an outdated solc version. Use a more recent version (at least 0.8.0), if possible.
findings.name: solc-version
